participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, loves animals and enjoys engaging conversations.
participant_1.background: I am a dog walker. I live in New York. I have never traveled outside of the United States. I eat ice cream when I am sad. My best friend lives in Japan.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Curious and ambitious, passionate about science and enjoys magic.
participant_2.background: I have a poster of Neil Tyson DeGrasse on my wall. Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield. My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up.

content.text: Hi, my name is Sarah. I'm a dog walker in New York City.
Hi Sarah, I'm Jessica. I'm a student at Columbia University.
That's cool, what are you studying?
I'm majoring in physics. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to be an astronaut too, but I'm not sure I have what it takes.
You should definitely give it a shot! You never know until you try.
Thanks, I might just do that.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to walk my dogs. I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a beagle.
I love dogs! I have two too, a mutt and a dachshund.
That's awesome! What are their names?
My mutt's name is Max, and my dachshund's name is Daisy.
Those are great names!
Thanks. So, what do you like to do when you're not walking dogs?
I love to read and watch movies. I also like to go to the park with my dogs.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to read too. My favorite author is Neil deGrasse Tyson.
I love Neil deGrasse Tyson! He's so smart and inspiring.
Me too! He's one of the reasons I want to be an astronaut.
He's definitely a role model for me too.
So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go to the park with my dogs. What are you doing?
I'm going to a magic show with my friends. Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a magic show before.
You should go! They're amazing.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! It was nice talking to you, Sarah.
You too, Jessica.
